name: screenocr
title: ScreenOCR
description: ScreenOCR allows you to quickly and easily extract text from screen captures via OCR, perfect for extracting text from any on-screen content. All processing is done locally on device.
author: huzef44

preferences.name: ocrMode
preferences.title: Recognition Level
preferences.description: Affects performance and accuracy of the text recognition.

preferences.name: languageCorrection
preferences.title: Language Correction
preferences.description: Applies language correction during the recognition process. Disabling this property returns the raw recognition results, which provides performance benefits but less accurate results.
preferences.label: Use Language Correction

preferences.name: keepImage
preferences.title: Keep Image in Clipboard
preferences.description: Keep the image in the clipboard after text recognition
preferences.label: Keep Image in Clipboard

preferences.name: customWordsList
preferences.title: Custom Words List
preferences.description: You can improve text recognition by providing a list of words that are special to your text
preferences.label: Custom Words List

commands.title: Select Recognition Languages
commands.description: Select Recognition Languages for ScreenOCR to recognize
commands.name: preferences
recognize-text
commands.title: Recognize Text
commands.description: Detect all text from the captured screen area.

commands.name: recognize-text-fullscreen
commands.title: Recognize Text Entire Screen
commands.description: Detect all text from the captured screen.

scripts.build-swift: swift build --configuration=release --arch arm64 --arch x86_64 && mv .build/apple/Products/Release/recognize-text assets
